name: Bacon Rebellion
description:
The pigs have gone mad! They are roaming around the countryside, driven by external forces and destroying every farm and killing every farmer they can lay their eyes on. You thought you were safe.. But no... they're right there.. hundreds.. thousands.. There is no hiding. You can only fight! It's up to you to stop this Bacon Rebellion and save your farm! 

Use your weapons, gain skills and powerups to stop this rebellion alone or with your friend! Save the world from the rebellious pigs in Campaign Mode or experience endless gameplay in Survival Mode and fight off randomized bosses!
